## Description {#details}

This pass does misc.

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> optimizations on IR <em>just</em> before instruction selection.

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;Optimize&quot; the virtual regs that cross basic block boundaries. When</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// building the SelectionDAG, vectors of illegal types that cross basic blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be scalarized and widened, with each scalar living in its</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vectors to equivalent vectors of legal type (which are converted back</span></CodeLine>
